author: Mmiglio
body:
Add initial data files that will be used in a unit test of the L1 Scouting data formats. These will be read by future releases to verify backward compatibility.

This is related to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/43467. I will open a new PR with improved unit tests for data format.
title: Add test file for DataFormats/L1Scouting
